name: Slice Party
description:
Become the ultimate bringer of sweet, tasty destruction with every single slash!

This game features three addictive gameplay modes which will keep you coming back for even higher scores.We’ve even added a brand new challenge system to keep you on your toes!
!
KEY FEATURES:
-Carve, splatter and slash your way through piles of colorful fruit in this juicy arcade action game.
-Customize your experience with unlockable weapons and backgrounds.
-Complete missions, hone your skills and earn rewards in our brand new challenge system.
